update:
update imm_activity_org
icom_id = #{icomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crt_user = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upd_user = #{updUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upd_time = #{updTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pcom_id = #{pcomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
win_calculation = #{winCalculation,jdbcType=CHAR},
base_date = #{baseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ccom_id = #{ccomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
